com.ibm.disni.verbs

接口 SVCPostSend.SendWRMod

  • 所有已知实现类:
    NatIbvSendWR
    封闭类:
    SVCPostSend

    public static interface SVCPostSend.SendWRMod
    Provides access methods to modify a given work-request belonging to this SVC object.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int getNum_sge()
      The number of scatter/gather elements in this work request.
      int getOpcode()
      Retrieve the opcode of this work request
      SVCPostSend.RdmaMod getRdmaMod()
      Provides access to the rdma information in this work request
      int getSend_flags()
      Retrieve the send flags of this work request
      SVCPostSend.SgeMod getSgeMod(int index)
      Returns a specific scatter/gather element of this work request.
      long getWr_id()
      Retrieve the current work-request id
      void setSend_flags(int send_flags)
      Modify the send flags
      void setWr_id(long wr_id)
      Modify the work-request id

    • 方法详细资料

      • setWr_id

        void setWr_id(long wr_id)
        Modify the work-request id
        参数:
        wr_id - the new wr_id

      • setSend_flags

        void setSend_flags(int send_flags)
        Modify the send flags
        参数:
        send_flags - new flags

      • getWr_id

        long getWr_id()
        Retrieve the current work-request id
        返回:
        the wr_id

        int getNum_sge()
        The number of scatter/gather elements in this work request.
        返回:
        the num_sge

        Retrieve the opcode of this work request
        返回:

      • getSend_flags

        Retrieve the send flags of this work request
        返回:

      • getRdmaMod

        SVCPostSend.RdmaMod getRdmaMod()
        Provides access to the rdma information in this work request
        返回:
        RDMA information

      • getSgeMod

        SVCPostSend.SgeMod getSgeMod(int index)
        Returns a specific scatter/gather element of this work request.
        参数:
        index - the sg element.
        返回:
        the sg element.
